name: A.I. Careers Advisory Service: Your Path To Success
name_original: A.I. Careers Advisory Service: Your Path To Success
description:
Are you looking for careers advice? Why not talk to our A.I. Careers Advisory Service. It will set you on the path to glory in your chosen career, & it doesn't really care about who you hurt to get to the top.

An interactive retro style thingy made with Bitsy (by Adam Le Doux). Use the arrow keys to move & also to interact with sprites & objects.

1. Talk to the advisor.
2. Chose your career.
3. Get to the top rung of the ladder.
